meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Sabbath.
meanings.sent1: The sabbatic day was spent in peaceful reflection.
meanings.sent2: The sabbatic traditions were observed with reverence.
meanings.sent3: The sabbatic hymns filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent4: The sabbatic atmosphere enveloped the church in tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The sabbatic rituals brought a sense of calm to the community.

meanings.definition: A period of rest or time off from work.
meanings.sent1: After a busy week, she enjoyed a sabbatic to recharge.
meanings.sent2: The company offers a sabbatic every five years for employees.
meanings.sent3: His idea of a sabbatic involved hammocks and sunshine.
meanings.sent4: Taking a sabbatic can rejuvenate your mind and body.
meanings.sent5: The sabbatic by the beach was a much-needed break from routine.
